original_text: He was more honourable than the thirty, but he attained not to the first three. And David set him over his guard.
korean_text: 삼십 명보다 존귀하나 그러나 세 사람에게는 미치지 못하였더라 다윗이 그를 세워 시위대 대장을 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: He was more honourable than the thirty
but he attained not to the first three
And David set him over his guard
